name: Super Cave Boy (Mijdax)
description:
Description

Super Cave Boy is a challenging platforming puzzler where advance in a dungeon full of puzzles. The game structures the dungeon in rooms  / stages where you only have a limited amount of actions to do in order to finish. So be aware what action you take next, that might leave you unable to finish the room and you might have to reset the room.

Use actions like hookshots, explosives, pickaxes and much more to reach the very end of the cave. The game focuses on gameplay and clever puzzles for a challenging experience.

Gameplay

Super Cave Boy focusses on 2d platforming mechanics but with a catch. You may only use a limited set of actions in every stage. For example one stage might only allow you to use 3 x Jumps and 2 x Pickaxe attacks and nothing else. Another might allow you to use 2 x climbing and 1 x picking objects. You will end up observing the stage and finding a way to use your tools in a creative way since they are usable very flexible usable.

Controls Features
  • Challenging and creative puzzles
  • Responsive 2D platforming
  • Multi-Purpose design principles
